documents.document: 2 am and I just finished grayscaling KAM pages for the night. What to do, what to do. I know! Watch The Breakfast Club.
@torey_nelson It was!
Now the grayscaling night-shift begins. Time for some Kyuss!
@NOIRComics Thanks, man! Still has to go through editorial but I think we have the cover. :)
Oh man! The cover for the new Kill All Monsters Omnibus is coming together big time! I'm stoked with what James Biggie is doing!
Listening to PRETTY HATE MACHINE on my walk. Reminding me of my clubbing dayzzzz.
@marissadraws Well, you know, there just isn't enough hate in the world. *searches for tv remote*
@fancypetetoms The long lost Archers of Loaf album.
@marissadraws So I shouldn't start watching it then?
@TonyGregori @DLairAustin @thevaultcomics It's a great read with awesome art.
@mikecane It's true. Food doesn't excite me in the least.
@JDFaithcomics Burn!
@marissadraws @DamooseSeth Seth is awesome.
I ended up just staying home and making some cheese sandwiches. I'll save the trip to Church's for another day.
@kellytindall Ha! Always thinking, Mr Tindall!
@Doigbag Bless that person. I love their tenders.
Fighting the urge to go to Church's Chicken & get me some chicken tenders. But leaving the house once every few days is a good thing, right?
@chrisarrant I may just take you up on that one of these days, Chris.
@lorenpettyart Sounds cool! Collaborative games are awesome.
@lorenpettyart That is one area I have never had much of an interest in, sadly. Good game, though?
Sigh. I *guess* it's time to take down the Christmas tree....
@xtop It's an utter and complete shit show.
It's been almost two weeks since I played a board game. I'm starting to jones.
@Big5Army That album is the only one I have but it scratches that hair band need I get quite nicely.
Ok, Tobias' license plate is pretty funny.
Season 4 of Arrested Development really is a dud. This is the 4 th time I'm watching it and I just don't laugh at any of it.
@TheAhmedRaafat Cool!
Some walking music! It's 2 late 4 love. https://t.co/lFBBflOfRE
@gulapocalypse Yeah, I paid my son, too. But at least I didn't have to scan all those pages. :)
This is why I had a kid.
My production assistant hard at work scanning Kill All Monsters pages. https://t.co/mS0IqsI6Mf
@enormouscomic I'm sure Noto is a smart dude, so I figure it all part of the protest. Just wondering if it will place him on a list...
@enormouscomic I was thinking the same thought.
That's just insane. https://t.co/F903xla0IR
I keep getting emails from ECCC about stuff. I don't want to unsubscribe but dang, I don't want to hear about the show as I'm not going.
The deadlines are making me stress drink. The beverage is only Pepsi but once past the lips, forever on the hips.
@NOIRComics That cover and the other 3 were mostly all @bigredrobot's doing. I just supplied the line art.
@NOIRComics Thanks, @TazComics!
@NOIRComics Where is that at?
I just backed A.A.I WARS - ISSUE 2 on @Kickstarter https://t.co/8me9MXxIh8
@Mister_Walsh Great Bible to have!
I rediscovered a couple of albums today. The Walk Hard OST and McLusky's McLusky Do Dallas. Lovin' these all over again.
When is it too early to start sucking up to reviewers? Wait, I've said too much...
I've been blessed to work with some amazing editors in comics. Shout out to my @DarkHorseComics editor, Dave Marshall! Making magic happen.
@FabianRangelJr @bleedingcool I love that site Bleeding Coor.
@pizzolo @ZacBeThompson @Lon_Monster @ericxyz @deezoid Such a great issue!
The art on The Few #1 is amazing! @Cleanlined really nailed it!
@fancypetetoms Oh man, I LOVED what you did in POP.
Shout outs 2 @marissadraws & @TBonvillain for their skills 2 make my work look way better on various covers/pinups. #ColoristAppreciationDay
Shout out to @crabtree_bill for supplying amaing colours for the Kill All Monsters story in DHP. #ColoristAppreciationDay
Shout out to @DougGarbark for his killer work on SANTOS. #ColoristAppreciationDay
Shout out to @fancypetetoms for his amazing work on POP. #ColoristAppreciationDay
Thanks for the RT, @roxypolk !
@ryanwriter HELLS YEAH!
@ryanwriter If only I was doing ECCC we could hammer something out in person. Drat!
@ryanwriter The more wack the better.
@ryanwriter We should jam on an idea one o' these dayzzzzzz.
@ryanwriter I dug this one a lot. As a person looking to start writing, you give some good tips. Thanks, man!
@J__Conklin It was fun to watch as I had totally forgotten how the movie ended. It was like watching it for the first time again.
@adrianlontoc I thought it was endearing.
For the first time in many years... #twitterTypoKing
Watched Amadeus for the first time many years. Still an amazing movie.
@Doigbag EBay is where I had to go.
The two Bill Sienkiewicz posters that hang above my computer/scanner area in my studio. Instant inspiration. https://t.co/Ge5zkU8euN
@piersmorgan You are an idiot.
My son Stewart is hard at work scanning all 179 new Kill All Monsters pages! https://t.co/r9pVPIpUGG
I just reread this book and thoroughly enjoyed it all over again! Check it out if you like sci-fi comics. Or just bâ€¦ https://t.co/Y0ai4VIIYM
DEATH RACE 2050 looks like awesome cheesy fun!
I'm a little rusty on the grayscaling but the KAM pages are looking gooooooood.
I'm sad to hear that John Watkiss has passed away. I really dug his work.
@TheMattDaniel Yeah, for sure!
@Neil_M_Burke Thanks, Neil!
It's only 179 pages to scan. #whatwasIthinking
Actually, scanning startssssss now. #boooooooooo
The KAM splatter factory is in full operation. Line art is done! Grayscaling startssssssss now! https://t.co/wcilbfTpx3
@NOIRComics The night was filled with New Model Army tunes.
@NOIRComics Right now it's Metallica. As for later tonight... anything is possible.
Nothing motivates like a deadline.
Keith Olbermann seems kinda kooky on his Resistance show. Overly theatrical. Makes him look like a tin foil hat guy.
The Meitu "Fairy-Tale" filter seems to have given me pinkeye...
My new pro headshot. https://t.co/Txtw0JDosu
@AlexPaknadel *initiate secret handshake*
@AlexPaknadel That's where I am.
@ryanwriter Of that I am sure!
@ryanwriter I'm still waiting for hover board fish.
@trailof_dead A political type game might be cool.
@trailof_dead What's the game like?
@BatagorJohnson Thanks for the pimpin', man!
@creativejoe83 Thanks!
Definitely not tears of sadness.
With delight. Cry with delight.
Now that KAM is starting to wrap up, I'm resisting the urge to email all the writers I want to work with. Must not email.
You don't want to break into comics. Comics will make you cry.
@NOIRComics Yeah, I listen to some different things. No classical/opera or jazz, though. Hardly any country/folk. But yeah...
@declanshalvey @edbrisson What's Murder Book?
Don't hate on the man who wears his sunglasses at night, yo.
Time to kick this inking party off with some Corey Hart!
The easy level Sudokus are fun but the harder ones seem like a guessing game as to which number to put in.
Laying out the last 3 Kill All Monsters pages in the coming KAM Omnibus. Still lots of work to do in the next 6 weeks, though.
@NOIRComics oh man... the only thing that beats it is my RONIN AE.
